SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
OnUpdateNeededListener, Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable, OnUpdateNeededListener
Player is a class that represent a player of the game. Players are identified by a nickName, which is unique within the game. Each player is associated with a PersonalGoal, that the player must satisfy in order to earn more points. The score earned by the player is saved in the pointPlayer attribute that always has a null or positive value.
Since:
10/04/2023
Version:
3.0

Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi
